name: The Amazing Adventures of Bob! A Road Safety Game!
name_original: The Amazing Adventures of Bob! A Road Safety Game!
description:
The Amazing Adventures of Bob! 
Can you help Bob to learn Road Safety & Crime Prevention and guide him to meet his true love before it is too late?  Will you be able to guide Bob and help him make wise decisions to stay out of trouble?
This is a simple Point & Click Game on Road Safety & Crime Prevention for young kids in Singapore; just so that you can have some fun learning something that may help you in your daily lives.
